item.description: HARARE – The Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe (RBZ) is set to introduce new Zimbabwe Gold (ZiG) banknotes on April 7, marking a significant milestone in the country’s ongoing currency reforms and broader efforts to stabilise the economy. The latest development forms part of the central b
item.dc:creator: The Zimbabwe Mail
